Default:
gaussian._xyz = gaussian._xyz
gaussian._rotation = gaussian._rotation
gaussian._scaling = gaussian._scaling
gaussian._opacity = gaussian._opacity
gaussian._features_dc = gaussian._features_dc
gaussian._features_rest = gaussian._features_rest
self.bg_color[:] = 0
Point Cloud:
gaussian._xyz = gaussian._xyz
gaussian._rotation = gaussian._rotation
gaussian._scaling = gaussian._scaling*0 - 8
gaussian._opacity = gaussian._opacity*0 + 10
gaussian._features_dc = gaussian._features_dc
gaussian._features_rest = gaussian._features_rest
self.bg_color[:] = 0
Only SH:
gaussian._xyz = gaussian._xyz
gaussian._rotation = gaussian._rotation
gaussian._scaling = gaussian._scaling
gaussian._opacity = gaussian._opacity
gaussian._features_dc = gaussian._features_dc * 0
gaussian._features_rest = gaussian._features_rest
self.bg_color[:] = 1
Mask Sphere:
mask = torch.linalg.norm(gaussian._xyz, dim=-1) < slider.x

gaussian._xyz = gaussian._xyz[mask]
gaussian._rotation = gaussian._rotation[mask]
gaussian._scaling = gaussian._scaling[mask]
gaussian._opacity = gaussian._opacity[mask]
gaussian._features_dc = gaussian._features_dc[mask]
gaussian._features_rest = gaussian._features_rest[mask]
self.bg_color[:] = 1
Mask Small Gaussians:
mask = torch.linalg.norm(gaussian._scaling, dim=-1) < slider.x * 2

gaussian._xyz = gaussian._xyz[mask]
gaussian._rotation = gaussian._rotation[mask]
gaussian._scaling = gaussian._scaling[mask]
gaussian._opacity = gaussian._opacity[mask]
gaussian._features_dc = gaussian._features_dc[mask]
gaussian._features_rest = gaussian._features_rest[mask]
self.bg_color[:] = 1
